snippet: Globe-trotting billionaire Nicolas Berggruen, the founder of the private equity group Berggruen Holdings, is bringing his effort to overhaul democracy before the elite of Europe.
lead_paragraph: Globe-trotting billionaire Nicolas Berggruen, the founder of the private equity group Berggruen Holdings, is bringing his effort to overhaul democracy before the elite of Europe.

headline.seo: Nicolas Berggruen’s Big Dreams of Steering Europe’s Future
headline.main: A Billionaire Dreams of Steering Europe’s Future
headline.print_headline: A Billionaire Dreams of Steering Europe’s Future
